titleStmt.title: Reasons for further additional duties upon paper shewing that such a tax will raise the publick revenue, and improve the manufacture of the nation, and employ a vast number of the poor. Humbly offered to the consideration of the honourable House of Commons.

Reasons for further additional duties upon paper shewing that such a tax will raise the publick revenue, and improve the manufacture of the nation, and employ a vast number of the poor. Humbly offered to the consideration of the honourable House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: A petition to the House of Commons, read 17 February 1702.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
